body:
# Raghotham Sripadraj

> raghotham.s@gmail.com | +91 9742020706   
> Github / Twitter: raghothams

## Interests

* Machine Learning
* Text Analytics
* Mobile & web development
* Databases

## Professional Experience

### Software Engineer

> SAP Labs India Pvt. Ltd. (Aug 2012 - Present)

* **Web Developer**
    * Part of the core architecture group that introduced the concept of Hybrid Mobile Apps to SAP
    * Worked on building and improving major UI frameworks employed currently inside SAP
    * **Technologies**: HTML5, JS, CSS, SAP UI5, Cordova

* **Glass & Mobile Developer**
    * Worked on POC for Google Glass to facilitate warehouse management
    * Worked on multiple applications that bring SAP workflows to the mobile platform
    * Part of all 3 applications listed on the Google Play Store
    * **Technologies**: Android, Windows 8, iOS 
    
### Software Engineering Intern

> SAP Labs India Pvt. Ltd. (Aug 2010 - Aug 2012)    

* **ABAP Developer & Tester**
    * Worked with the System Landscape Optimization team to build tools to monitor status of landscape transformation    
    * Built a POC mobile application to bring the postal workflow on mobile.
    * **Technologies**: Android
    
## Projects

### MS Project

* **Large Scale Hierarchical Text Classifier**
    * Worked on a problem to classify wikipedia documents into different categories using Machine Learning practices and build a hierarchy.
    * **Technologies**: Python, Sci-kit learn, Joblib, 0MQ
    
### Side Projects

* **Linkur**
    * A simple link sharing platform to share links within groups.
    * **Technologies**: Python+Flask, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, AngularJS, Twitter Bootstrap
    
* **Feedlyze**
    * A visualization tool to help analyze feedbacks from a Google Spreadsheet based on Text Analytics practices.
    * **Technologies**: Python+Flask, NLTK, AngularJS, Twitter Bootstrap
    
* **Project-Gnom**
    * A complete solution to enable restaurants to go mobile with their order taking, billing and inventory management.
    * **Technologies**: Java+Restlets, MySQL, Android, AngularJS, Twitter Bootstrap 

## Achievements

* Handled multiple trainings at SAP on topics like SAPUI5, HTML5 and Git
* Speaker at various internal and external SAP events like Teched,  DKOM, Product Innovation Day
* Winner of Startup Weekend Bangalore 2012 (3rd place)
* Active participant at various Hackathons and Technology Conferences

## Technologies

* **Platforms**: Android, Windows8, Apache Cordova, iOS
* **UI**: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, AngularJS
* **Backend**: Java, Python
* **Databases**: PostgreSQL, MongoDB
* **OS**: Nix, OSX, Windows

## Educational Qualifications

* **MS, Bits Pilani** | 7.3 CGPA
* **BCA, PES** | 83% Aggregate
